org.qi4j.valueserialization.jackson

Interface JacksonValueSerializationService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ValueDeserializer, ValueSerialization, ValueSerializer

    @Mixins(value={JacksonValueSerializer.class,JacksonValueDeserializer.class})
public interface JacksonValueSerializationService
extends ValueSerialization
    ValueSerialization Service producing and consuming JSON documents using Jackson.
